Intelligent Spend Management
Manage every source of spend, across every category, for one unified view.
Contact us Learn about HDFC Bank & SAP Concur Solutions
The growing need for intelligent spend management

As spend management becomes more complex, new technologies that can combine every source and category of spend is a priority across multiple departments. By leveraging technology to connect spend data, and create intelligent spend management workflows, your organization can:

Capture data and get a unified view of every dollar spent
Drive policy compliance and be more efficient
Quickly realign spending based on changing priorities
Plan and make business decisions based on accurate and complete spend data

Read the whitepaper

The future of spend management is intelligent

Today, organizations turn to emerging technologies that connect workflows, better allocate resources, and speed up processes. When spend management is intelligent, automated, and integrated, businesses thrive. Download our whitepaper and learn how the intelligent enterprise is changing the face of business.

Get the whitepaper

Intelligent spend management for T&E

Good spend management is the key to success for every business. Today, keeping track of how and where money is spent is harder than ever. Download the e-Book and find out how finance and IT leaders can work together to run a smarter business with intelligent spend management.

Get the e-Book

HDFC Bank & SAP Concur Solutions Corporate Credit Cards

The HDFC Bank & SAP Concur Solutions Corporate Credit Cards are designed with frequent spenders in mind. With SAP Concur Solutions, global leaders in Travel & Expense Management solution and HDFC Bank’s - India’s largest private sector bank, we offer a seamless and integrated travel experience.

Learn about HDFC Bank & SAP Concur Solutions

Intelligent spend management includes three key capabilities: managing every source of employee spending, across categories, and bringing that data into one unified view. Most organizations are already on a journey to build these capabilities, but intelligent technologies, such as machine learning and advanced analytics, coupled with a broad ecosystem and network, enhance their progress tremendously.

Mike Eberhard, President, SAP Intelligent Spend Group
